Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

CompositionService.description: The CompositionService schema describes a composition service and its properties and links to the resources available for composition.
CompositionService.longDescription: This resource shall represent the composition service and its properties for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AllowOverprovisioning.description: An indication of whether this service is allowed to overprovision a composition relative to the composition request.
AllowOverprovisioning.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether this service is allowed to overprovision a composition relative to the composition request.

AllowZoneAffinity.description: An indication of whether a client can request that a specific resource zone fulfill a composition request.
AllowZoneAffinity.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether a client can request that a specific resource zone fulfill a composition request.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ResourceBlocks.description: The resource blocks available on the service.
ResourceBlocks.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ResourceBlockCollection.

ResourceZones.description: The resource zones available on the service.
ResourceZones.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ZoneCollection.

ServiceEnabled.description: An indication of whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether this service is enabled.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #CompositionService.v1_1_3.CompositionService
